directions: Grind oats in a blender into a powder-like consistency. Add ice cubes; pulse until ground. Add banana, avocado, and strawberries; blend until smooth. Pour in carrot juice and yogurt; blend until combined.
ingredients: 2 strawberries, hulled, or more to taste
1 (5.3 ounce) container banana cream yogurt (such as Oikos®)
title: Strawberry Banana Avocado Smoothie
